itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by John Maas of Mountain Primal Mean Co. and Shelly Kirkland of the veteran charity Boot Campaign so that John could present Boot Campaign with a check for $100,000 on behalf of Mountain Primal. John also gets into how the meat business works and Shelly breaks down different Boot Campaign events like the “Redneck Triathlon”.
